name: Tiny Visitors
description:
TINY VISITORS is a 3D Platformer, based on physics, mixing escape-game, search&find and mini-games. You can play up to 4 players in local coop.



3D Platformer

You can (and you'll have to) run, jump, climb, use a jetpack, fall, fall and use your jetpack, fall again, ragequit, jump again... I think you got it !



Physics

Grab, pull, push, throw all small objects around you. The lighter it is, the faster it flies. Have fun using objects to help your friends reaching high skies !



Local coop up to 4 players

You don't have to go alone in the adventure. Play with your friends ! (if you have more than 3 friends, don't waste your time on this game, go play outside)
Help each other or mess with one another.
(Some controllers are needed for local multiplayer)



Mini-games

You're tired of searching a way to escape the house ? Take a break with funny mini-games you'll find in the rooms.
